title: 226 31 "The Guy Who’s the Closest to Invincible? And the Most Dangerous Man!"Transliteration: "Mottomo Muteki ni Chikai Yatsu? To Mottomo Kiken na Otoko!" (Japanese:最も無敵に近い奴?と最も危険な男!)
